history.proof: intros l m H. induction H. - reflexivity. - simpl. f_equal. apply IHpermutation. - simpl. repeat f_equal. - assert (H1: length l1 = length l2). apply IHpermutation1. assert (H2: length l2 = length l3). apply IHpermutation2. rewrite H1, <- H2. reflexivity.

original: intros l m H. induction H. - reflexivity. - simpl. f_equal. apply IHpermutation. - simpl. repeat f_equal. - assert (H1: length l1 = length l2). { apply IHpermutation1. } assert (H2: length l2 = length l3). { apply IHpermutation2. } rewrite H1, <- H2. reflexivity.
